title: Who are the medical doctors currently in tech? - Quora

response.answer_text: Take a look at the MD's on the speaker list for the Big Data in Biomedicine conference:Speakers | Big Data in Biomedicine Conference | Stanford Medicine Some key people in the private sector:-Amy Abernathy of Flatiron Health-David Heckerman of Microsoft-Jill Hagenkord of 23andMe-Gaurav Singal of Foundation Medicine That should be enough to get you started.
